text: shameless plug that my girlfriend is dj’ing at this event on saturday: <https://www.eventbrite.com/e/pdx-margarita-summer-festival-tickets-34351257536>

attachments.title: PDX Margarita Summer Festival
attachments.text: Bye winter. Hola Summer. Let’s celebrate the arrival of our best days at Portland’s MARGARITA SUMMER FESTIVAL! MARGARITA FEST is a Summer Festival designed to bring people together through one of the most beloved Summer cocktails: The Margarita. Local and International purveyors of fine spirits will offer creative and traditional margaritas for your enjoyment. Salt, no salt and everything in between. Margaritas are better with food and music, so we’ll have plenty of that too. The event is at the Ecotrust building, where VIP goers can enjoy the sun in style on their outdoor patio. Tickets: Solstice VIP 8 margarita samples + 5 spirit samples + 4 food samples + exclusive entrance to VIP patio rooftop $55 Summer Sipper GA 5 margarita samples +4 spirit samples  $30 Sunsoaker GA  5 margarita samples $22 Food will be available for sale on site. You may also purchase margaritas, beer and non alcoholic drinks. This event is 21+ ID Required  *Tickets available at link $22-$55 *FOOD VENDOR APPLICATION: <https://form.jotform.us/71127509883159> *SPIRITS/BEVERAGE SUBMISSION: <https://form.jotform.com/71146087046152> *For interested Sponsors please email <mailto:luxuryagave@gmail.com|luxuryagave@gmail.com>

text: tequila + reggaton - what better way to spend a saturday?
